name: TONARI
description:
A short & fun puzzle-platformer by izioq with naive minimal art & soothing music where you need to collect sparks to reach the next level.

Download for free the looped soundtrack: https://izioq.bandcamp.com/album/tonari-soundtrack

- IF TONARI DOESN'T RUN ON YOUR COMPUTER, PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING -

TONARI is a short game made with an old game engine called CLASSIC CONSTRUCT.
That's why it needs specificaly DirectX 9 from August 2008 installed on your computer to run properly. It should already be installed on your computer but, if not and the game doesn't run, please follow this safe & official Microsoft URL to download & install it:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=9155

Having DirectX9 and a more recent version installed in parrallel should not cause troubles.

Thanks for playing my game :)

- izioq -
